nodes.text: The clay warriors of Zardossa Stix were a set of clay statues from the moon Zardossa Stix. Representations of an ancient fallen army, Zardossan legend claimed that the statues were the only things keeping the warriors dead, and they would return to life if the statues were ever destroyed. After discovering the binding statues which, initially unbeknownst to him, held the sentient carnivorous plants known as the Drengir in stasis, Jedi Master Cohmac Vitus compared the statues to the clay warriors after beginning to discover their true purpose.
